content1: VanillaMC Season 4 released! This new season introduces many new features such as custom enchants, custom items, and more!
content2: Vanilla Launcher v1.0.0 released make sure to tell your friends! The launcher is still in its beta so make sure to report any bugs or issues you encounter.
content3: EaglercraftX 1.8 u46 released. Fixed WASM not autosaving world when tab closed, fixed pointer lock issue, unnecessary normalization in some fragment shaders fixed.
